name.vi: Sự ban phước của nữ thần

description.en: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.ar: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.br: Adiciona atributos complementares aos conjuntos fashion e capas da Loja Premium. O item alvo torna-se inegociável a menos que a bênção seja removida pela Peach, a especialista em joias em Flarine.
description.cns: 为高级商店的时装和披风添加额外的增益效果。 除非该效果被帕里的珠宝大师皮奇移除，否则目标物品将被禁止交易。
description.de: Der Segen der Göttin gibt deinen Umhängen oder der Cash Shop Kleidung (NICHT für Brillen) einen zusätzlichen Bonus.
description.fi: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.fil: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.fr: La Déesse confère à vos capes ou tenues de la boutique des attributs supplémentaires. Lie l'objet ciblé à votre personnage, à moins de faire supprimer la bénédiction par Angie à Flarine.
description.id: Menambahkan stat tambahan ke fashion items dan cloaks di Premium Shop. Item target menjadi no-trade kecuali berkat dihapus oleh Jewel Manager Peach di Flarine.
description.it: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.jp: マントやファッションアイテムに祝福を与え、特別なステータスが付与されます。祝福後は取引やドロップができなくなります。[ボボタの助手]ピーチにて解除後、再度取引が可能となります。
description.kr: 프리미엄 상점 패션 아이템 및 망토에 부가 능력치를 부여합니다. 해당 아이템은 플라리네의 쥬얼 매니저 피치에 의해 축복이 제거되지 않으면 거래 불가능합니다.
description.nl: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.pl: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.ru: Добавляет дополнительный параметр платным костюмам и плащам. Такой предмет будет невозможно передать другому игроку. Чтобы снять касание, поговорите с ювелиром Персеидой во Фларинции.
description.sp: Añade una estadística adicional a los objetos fashion y capas de la Tienda Premium. El objeto se convierte en no intercambiable a menos que la bendición sea eliminada por la Mánager de Gemas Peach en Flarine.
description.sw: Adds an additional stat to Premium Shop fashion items and cloaks. Target item becomes no-trade unless the blessing is removed by Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
description.th: เพิ่มสถานะเพิ่มเติมให้กับไอเท็มแฟชั่นและเสื้อคลุมของร้านพรีเมี่ยม ไอเท็มเป้าหมายจะไม่ถูกแลกเปลี่ยนเว้นแต่พรจะถูกลบโดย Jewel Manager Peach ใน Flarine
description.tw: 對高級商店的外觀物品和斗篷附加能力，物品將會變成無法交易狀態，除非到[寶石專家]波奇那移除效果
description.vi: Thêm một chỉ số bổ sung cho các mặt hàng thời trang và áo choàng của Cửa hàng cao cấp. Vật phẩm mục tiêu trở thành cấm giao dịch trừ khi phước lành bị xóa bởi Jewel Manager Peach in Flarine.
